page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content: Every year people come to this area for their holidays.There are many places for them to visit such as Felbrigg Hall, Blickling Hall,{(National Trust).}The Norfolk {Broads}are not far from this area and the coast is only about 5miles away. Lots of people get seasonal emploment because of the high standard of the holiday trade.There is not many hotels in this area and most people come to Norfolk to see the wildlife. Many people come to this area from the {Midlands}and like it so much that they either buy a{holiday}house here or buy a house to retire to .However ,in the winter it is quiet not quiet so beautiful when the north wind is blowing{! }Also the lack of buses and shops in the country areas upsets some people.North Norfolk is very peaceful compared to the city.
